# fetchAllSubscriptionsOperation()

**Type Method**

Returns an operation that fetches all of the user’s subscriptions.

## Declaration

```swift
class func fetchAllSubscriptionsOperation() -> Self
```

## Discussion

After creating the operation, set the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchSubscriptionsOperation/fetchSubscriptionCompletionBlock-207ep] property to process the results.
title: fetchAllSubscriptionsOperation()
